items.title: Sales and Business Development
items.content:
Sales and Business Development at InStyle Villas

Greece, Remote · Full Time
Compensation
€5K–€40K
1.0%–5.0%
Visa Sponsorship
Not available

Job Description

Key Responsibilities:
• Undertake local market analysis and build segmentation framework
• Develop relationships with key contacts in local travel industry, and identify suitable opportunities for promoting InStyle Villas, and generate revenue opportunities through sale or rental of villas.
• Develop additional revenue streams in line with short and long term objectives/targets, and strategies for the company
• Conducting sales calls to key accounts or major prospects
• Act as a local representative of the company
• Support business development & marketing activities
• Promote ISV villas through local Social Media Channels: Facebook, Blogs, LinkedIn and other social networks
• Suggest quality improvements
• Develop client relationship through aligning with concierge services and luxury services
• Follow up with client for satisfaction surveys

Requirements:
• A Bachelor’s degree in tourism / hotel management / related degree is required, in-addition 1-3 years of demonstrated success promoting luxury travel rental& packages preferably to local High Networth Individuals (HNI’s), wedding planners, and corporate clients. A Master’s degree in tourism and international education will be preferred.
• Superior verbal communication skills. Bilingual – English +1 more language.
• Proven track record of success in sales / partner development/account management
• Ability to work well independently and be self-motivated
• Have creative and entrepreneurial mindset; is interested in helping to build a business and to be compensated according to performance
• Have demonstrated ability and initiative to handle increasing responsibility over time

Candidate (s) will initially be engaged on three month probation with remote training and monitoring from HQ. Candidates successfully meeting KPIs and Sales Target will be inducted into the team

items.title: Blockchain Education Growth Manager, Strategic Initiatives Team
items.content:
Blockchain Education Growth Manager, Strategic Initiatives Team at ConsenSys

Brooklyn, Remote · Full Time
Compensation
$90K–$130K
0.01%–0.01%
Visa Sponsorship
Available

Job Description

Apply Here: https://consensys.net/open-positions/?gh_jid=730153

ConsenSys is the world’s largest blockchain venture production studio focused on developing cutting edge application across all major industry sectors, investing in disruptive startups, and consulting global organizations / governments on decentralized technologies powered by Ethereum.

Our mission is to use these solutions to power the emerging economic, social, and political operating systems of the planet. ConsenSys is building the future of identity, financial markets, commerce, security and infrastructure, and more.

About the role:

The education team at ConsenSys is growing fast within ConsenSys with the first of its kind blockchain education programs being developed and delivered globally. We are a team of ex-consultants, bankers, product managers, project managers, educators, entrepreneurs, and teachers. Given the explosive growth of blockchain technologies worldwide, the projects led by this team are strategic in nature with implications for the global blockchain ecosystem.

The team’s partners include global corporations, major governments, world class developers / lawyers / business schools and our initiatives are changing education paradigms fundamentally.

Learn more about us here:

https://consensys.net/press/
https://consensys.net
Our team's first initiative: https://medium.com/@ConsenSysAcademy

About you:

A multi-tasker who thrives in a fast-paced environment
Self-directed and motivated by leading projects end to end
An innovative problem solver who likes to get new initiatives off the ground and then see them executed flawlessly to completion
A strategic and critical thinker but with an eye to outcomes
A decision maker with the ability to generate buy-in and / or adjust conclusions rapidly based on inputs
Out of the box in solution design but methodical and structured in execution

Your Qualifications:

3-4 years of experience in finance, management consulting or building businesses
Excellent verbal and written communication skills with demonstrated experience engaging and influencing executives and entrepreneurs alike
Entrepreneurial spirit with track record for successfully delivering measurable results in fast-moving environments
You have a passion and enthusiasm for our business and the greater movement it is a part of
Great chemistry with our team and culture
Optional

MBA
Domain knowledge or prior experience in education or curriculum design
Technical understanding of blockchain
Brooklyn NY preferred, open to other remote locations

items.title: (stealth start-up) | Business partner | Anywhere US | Part-time OK | REMOTE (US-only) | up to 50% equity
items.content:
(stealth start-up) | Business partner | Anywhere US | Part-time OK | REMOTE (US-only) | up to 50% equity

I am looking for a business co-founder with up to 50% equity for a fully automated e-commerce business based initially on drop-shipping high quality items on Amazon and other platforms. In parallel, I am building an SaaS (another company) exposing some of the functionality developed for this purpose to 3rd party sellers and would like to have this new company as a dogfooding business that is fully automated, profitable, growing and solid (100% customer and platform satisfaction), instantly putting into use latest tech I develop. I have already fully automated inventory ETL generation, automated repricing, purging stale stock, retrieving orders, placing them at suppliers and notifying customers about shipping. In addition, I am a Deep Learning expert and work on NLP and TTS tech for automating client support as well. Your role would be handling all administrative tasks, searching for new high-quality suppliers, handling Amazon issues and initially customer support until it is automated away. You need to be a US resident, ideally citizen, working from anywhere/anytime you want, usually less than 1h/day. Contact me on deepmarket@tuta.io.

items.title: Enterprise Account Executive - EMEA - Sparta Systems, Inc. - Remote
items.content:
Enterprise Account Executive - EMEA
Sparta Systems, Inc. -Remote
If you share a true passion for technology, enjoy working together in developing solutions, share ideas, and exchange knowledge we want to talk to you. Sparta Systems is the Leader in Enterprise Quality Management Solutions (EQMS) and moving forward!

We have a work hard, play hard culture and want the best players on our team! This is a huge opportunity to join an industry leader with potential for exponential growth and great financial reward. As an Account Executive at Sparta you will interact with senior management and have the opportunity to significantly contribute to the growth of our business! You will be responsible for selling Sparta software, services, and training within your assigned accounts/territory and to targeted top-ranked companies. Sales will be generated through personal contact, prospecting, business case justification, demonstrations, phone calls and written proposals. A complete sales cycle of activities from lead identification through contract negotiation, account transition to services, ongoing support and follow on sales will be performed.

Required skills:
  • Minimum of 5 years selling complex enterprise software solutions to large corporations, with experience of selling to consumer products companies and C-level executives.
  • Proven success in previous sales experience for each of the past five years.
  • Expected minimum of 2-3 years’ experience at each position held during previous 10 years
  • Customer references will be requested
  • Education to degree level

Preferred Skills:

Founded in 1994, Sparta Systems is the world’s premier provider of cloud and on-premise quality management software. We offer the solutions, analytics, and expertise that speed up quality and compliance. Companies in life sciences, consumer products, discrete manufacturing and more, rely on Sparta.

Sparta Systems Offers:
  • Competitive salaries
  • 401k and great benefits package
  • An outstanding collaborative work environment in our state of the art facility
  • Employee engagement programs such as Sparta Gives Back, Wellness, Spirit Committee, etc.
  • An opportunity to work for the leader

Sparta Systems, Inc. is the industry leader for global enterprise quality management solutions (EQMS) and compliance management systems. Its TrackWise Enterprise Quality Management Software is a web-based software application used by quality, manufacturing, and regulatory affairs professionals to manage quality and compliance issues across the enterprise. We have an extensive customer base in the life sciences and other highly regulated industries. Sparta Systems offers its customers a complete solution for global quality management needs, including the onsite support required throughout the project lifecycle.

Life is short… Work somewhere outstanding… Sparta Systems!

Sparta Systems in an Equal Opportunity Employer with our Headquarters located in Hamilton, NJ

items.title: Account Executive (East Region) - McCormick - Work at Home
items.content:
Account Executive (East Region) - Work at Home - Indeed Mobile

Account Executive (East Region)
McCormick - Work at Home

McCormick & Co., Inc., a world leader in the spice, flavor & seasonings industry, is seeking a full time Retail Account Executive – Northeast & Mid-Atlantic Region. This new hire will work for Gourmet Garden (gourmetgarden.com), a leading brand in the fresh produce department, calling on Ahold, Delhaize, Wegmans, Wakefern, Safeway Eastern, Market Basket and other independent retailers. The Account Executive will report to the Head of Sales for Gourmet Garden North America.

With more than $4 billion in annual sales, the Company manufactures markets and distributes spices, seasoning mixes, condiments and other flavorful products to the entire food industry – retail outlets, food manufacturers and foodservice businesses. We create differentiating flavors consumers prefer with unmatched quality, science, innovation and service. Every day, no matter where or what you eat, you can enjoy food flavored by McCormick. McCormick makes every moment and meal better™

As a company recognized for exceptional commitment to employees, McCormick offers a wide variety of benefits, programs and services. Benefits include, but are not limited to, tuition assistance, medical, dental, vision, disability, group life insurance, 401(k), profit sharing, paid holidays and vacations.

POSITION OVERVIEW

This Retail Account Executive is responsible for the achievement of customer volume objectives, budgets and planning. Execution of Retail controllables and customer collaboration are key responsibilities to the success of this position.

RESPONSIBILITIES

Developing and delivering customer plans to achieve volume objectives and primary and day-to-day selling interface at customer HQ.
Manage direct and indirect account sales of Gourmet Garden product offerings, category performance reviews, forecast & distribution for existing brands and new products.
Manage a team of dedicated part-time merchandisers exclusively representing the Gourmet Garden brand at store-level.
Partner with our produce broker network to execute business plans and optimize retail execution.
Represents the brand at selected regional and national produce trade shows.

REQUIRED QUALIFICATIONS

Bachelor’s Degree in Business, Marketing, Management or related field.
Minimum 4 years Sales, Marketing or related experience with a minimum of 2 years’ experience successfully managing customer base.
Proficient in the Microsoft Excel, PowerPoint, Outlook, Office365.
Excellent verbal and written communication, negotiating and influencing, teamwork and relationship, computer and analytical skills.
Ability to analyze, interpret and leverage syndicated and internal sales data.
Understanding of the Produce/CPG industry sector and competitive landscape required.
Ability to travel, approximately 25% of the time.
Valid Driver License and clean driving record.

PREFERRED QUALIFICATIONS

Strong relationships within retail and wholesale fresh produce channels in the assigned region.
Experience in channels/segments outside of traditional grocery (i.e., Natural, E-Commerce, etc.).
Entrepreneurial approach as portion of customer portfolio will be targeting undersold or unsold accounts.

McCormick & Company is an equal opportunity/affirmative action employer. All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to sex, gender identity, sexual orientation, race, color, religion, national origin, disability, protected veteran status, age, or any other characteristic protected by law.

McCormick does not offer employment visa sponsorships upon hire or in the future. You must be lawfully authorized to commence work upon being offered employment.

Business Development Representative at Go Moment

Santa Monica, Remote · Full Time
Skills
Sales, Hospitality, Cold Calling, Demand Generation, Hotels
Compensation
$30K–$65K
No Equity
Visa Sponsorship
Not available

Job Description

We’re looking for a skilled Business Development Representative to manage our new business acquisition pipeline. Your highly motivating, self-starting nature will ensure complete success in this new role.

As our Business Development Representative, your goals include, but aren’t limited to the following:

- Engage potential new clients by introducing Go Moment, our products, and benefits via phone outreach (Expected 100+ calls per day)
- Schedule product demos for potential clients and Go Moment Partnership Managers
- Run call and email campaigns to generate new sales prospects
- Manage Salesforce profiles ensuring all communication is accurately documented
- Build and update sales pipeline reports

About you:

- 0-3 years of experience in Lead Generation or Sales (preferably hunter sales roles)
- High need for achievement and competition who loves to win -- Unfazed by rejection
- Strong organization and time management skills
- Experience working and succeeding in a quota and goal driven environment
- Easily builds rapport and establishes relationships with prospects and teammates
- Listens patiently, while probing to understand customer's needs
- Resourceful, goes over, under, around, and through obstacles to achieve success
- Bachelor's Degree or equivalent education and experience

Compensation for this position is based off performance with a ton of room for growth and development!

If interested in joining the Go Moment team, please submit your resume to: shane@gomoment.com

Subject line: Your first and last name Resume (BDR)

Candidates will only be considered when submitting a resume in this format.

items.content:
Autonomous Manufacturing ltd (rpplatform.com) is a fast-growing software startup in the 3D Printing Industry based in Central London. The leading additive manufacturing enterprises across Europe and North America trust our platform to manage and automate their operation.

As a Pre-sales Specialist (home office or London office based) you will be responsible for following up on sales leads, executing warm and cold calls, and establishing an initial contact with potential clients. This will involve engaging with new prospects, discussing their wants and needs, and demonstrating the unique features and technologies that make RP Platform the leading solution.


*YOUR RESPONSIBILITIES:*

* Research, identify and generate new opportunities over the internet and phone
* Call leads to set sales meetings
* Collaborate with senior management to improve the sales process and strategy

*WHAT WE EXPECT:*

* German fluency is required
* 1 year of direct work experience in telesales or inside sales
* Knowledge of sales principles, methods, practices and techniques
* Exceptional verbal communication and presentation skills
* Self-motivated, with a high level of integrity and work ethic

*BENEFITS:*

* Chance to contribute and make a real difference
* Work in an exciting fast-paced environment
* Opportunity to work remotely from a home office
* Office location in central London / Farringdon
* Competitive OTE package

items.title: BuySellAds.com: Ad Sales Operations Specialist
items.content:
Full-time

(Anywhere)

We are seeking a highly motivated individual that can work in a data-driven environment. The candidate will be an analytical problem solver, and have a high level of customer focus.

Have you ever built a bridge? Get ready to connect the ad operations, sales, and marketing teams. We need help enabling effective decision making by retrieving and aggregating data from multiple sources. Once we get the data, we’ll need help compiling it into a digestible and actionable format so that the Sales team can make informed decisions. 

Your Responsibilities: 

  • Develop strong understanding of BuySellAds media products
  • Work in partnership with the Sales team to understand client objectives and needs
  • Help take a signed IO and turn it into a live, successful campaign
  • Continually be in the know on our top buyer campaigns and analyze for opportunities for improvement alongside sales representatives
  • Assist in finding resolutions to ad serving issues and reporting discrepancies
  • Work with Ad Ops Team to monitor all live campaigns for proper serving, click through action, and conversion events
  • Assist advertisers with their reporting needs, and support the Sales Team with reporting requests
  • Obtain creative/3rd party tags and assist in delivery or creation when needed

The Ideal Candidate:

  • Is excited at the opportunity to help marketers achieve complex goals
  • Has experience in the advertising industry
  • Is obsessive about web tech
  • Obsessively checks emails and replies at an alarming rate
  • Is organized and structured but is not fazed by an out of the box request
  • Has the ability to work independently, consistently producing meaningful results
  • Is comfortable working remotely
  • Ability to adapt in a fast-changing environment
  • Strong analytical and problem solving skills
  • Ability to prioritize tasks with a proactive "can-do" attitude
  • Client-focused mindset with a passion for using data and analytics to drive business results
  • Familiarity with different online advertising pricing structures (CPC, CPM, CPA, etc.)
  • Understanding of third-party advertising tags and reporting
  • Bonus points for past marketing analyst or sales operation experience

About Us:

BuySellAds transformed the way advertising was transacted online with the introduction of its Marketplace in 2008. BuySellAds’ advertising technology platform provides advertisers with direct access to the industry’s top performing display, native, dedicated email, and sponsored content inventory. Our platform empowers both advertisers and publishers by bridging the ad tech divide. Today, we work with more than 12,000 advertisers and help them connect with the internet’s most passionate audiences. We are a remote company that primarily works around an EST schedule.

To apply email salesopsQ12018@buysellads.com with your resume and why you would be a good fit.

items.content:
UTC Hub is empowering the next generation of Henry Fords, Mark Zuckerbergs and Elon Musks with the skills and connections to successfully launch their career. Fancy joining us on this mission?

We are searching for a high-energy, self-motivated Sales Development Representative to join our growing team. This person will help generate new sales opportunities by strategically identifying, engaging and developing relationships through high-touch outbound marketing programs with clients of all levels, in a variety of industries. The ideal candidate will possess excellent communication skills.

*Responsibilities*
* Work closely with our management team to research accounts, identify key players, generate interest and develop accounts to create opportunities
* Drive targeted engagement through high-volume prospecting, utilising different communication channels; telephone, email, social outreach etc.
* Detail every interaction with a prospect in our CRM system (HubSpot)
* Support our management team on account strategy, and meeting preparation
* Develop & execute high-value presentations and product demonstrations

*Who are we looking for?*
* You have experience working in a customer-facing role
* You have a lot of energy, are self-motivated and professional
* You are very organised and have the ability to multitask
* You are passionate about startups and technology
* You are a quick learner and not afraid to make mistakes
* You have the ability to clearly and persuasively articulate the company’s value proposition

*Benefits*
* Competitive salary and incentives
* Fast-paced startup environment with a lot of responsibility and self-management
* Very sociable team - fortnightly team meals & weekly drinks at our favourite local pub
* Luxury working environment with free fruit, cereal and a great coffee machine
* The ability to work remotely some of the time if desired
* Training & CPD budget

items.title: Senior Account Manager- Pet Foods (Home Based) - DSM Nutritional Products - Home Based
items.content:
Senior Account Manager- Pet Foods (Home Based) - Home Based - Indeed Mobile

Senior Account Manager- Pet Foods (Home Based)
DSM Nutritional Products - Home Based

DSM – Bright Science. Brighter Living.™

Royal DSM is a global science-based company active in health, nutrition and materials. By connecting its unique competences in life sciences and materials sciences DSM is driving economic prosperity, environmental progress and social advances to create sustainable value for all stakeholders simultaneously. DSM delivers innovative solutions that nourish, protect and improve performance in global markets such as food and dietary supplements, personal care, feed, medical devices, automotive, paints, electrical and electronics, life protection, alternative energy and bio-based materials. DSM and its associated companies deliver annual net sales of about €10 billion with approximately 25,000 employees. The company is listed on Euronext Amsterdam. More information can be found at www.dsm.com.

Overview:
The Senior Account Manager is responsible for managing pet food customers for DSM in North America in terms of top-line line as well as profitability. Develop privileged relationships with large and mid sized pet food customers. Achieve KPI objectives (Sales, GPx, NBD, CAPs and personal objectives) according to regional marketing targets and global pricing strategy (commercial guidelines). Obtain in-depth knowledge about customers and competitors and share it within DNP. Manage multi-functional customer teams responsible for creating value for pet nutrition customers.

Key Responsibilites:
Manage pet food customers: Nestles, Smuckers and other pet food customers.
Define and implement business plan for customers in collaboration with the regional customer teams.
Lead contract negotiations with pet nutrition customers.
Implement well defined customer strategies for pet nutrition customers by collaborating with ANH team to bring best in class service and value to DSM pet nutrition customers
Formulate, recommend and communicate business strategies and objectives to attain profit and sales goals for pet nutrition customers.
Identify customer–driven opportunities to innovate new products and technologies that bring value to our customers and DSM.
Collaborate closely with global pet nutrition team and ANH organization to define and implement the go-to-market strategy for the pet nutrition business.
Support and facilitate product/concept launches together with other relevant functions

**Will manage large pet accounts located in St. Louis, Ohio, and others in Pennsylvania**

Knowledge and Experience:
Bachelor degree in animal science/nutrition, food science or related discipline. Additional degree in business management is a plus.
Must maintain highest standards of ethics.
Exceptional customer management, negotiation and strategic selling skills.

items.title: Sales Development Representative
items.content:
About TINT:
TINT’s vision is to help brands humanize their marketing across their customer journey. Why? Because traditional brand marketing is not working effectively anymore. Consumers are constantly bombarded with unengaging and irrelevant ads on the daily, leading to ads being blocked and trust diminishing.

To solve this, our belief is that a brand’s customers are often its best marketers, and the explosion of social media sharing on smartphones has substantially scaled word of mouth marketing for organizations.

TINT’s software platform empowers B2C marketers to find, curate, and display their most effective customer-generated content from social media onto their websites, digital screens, emails, social ads, and jumbotrons. That way they can increase engagement and trust with consumers, which leads to increasing marketing performance and decreasing content creation costs.

Our company is a 4.5 year, profitable, bootstrapped startup with 30 team members headquartered in San Francisco with a distributed team across the globe (US, London, Dubai, India, Canada, Brazil). Our team has overcome many odds, including achieving profitability within 5 months of launch, growing to $1m ARR within 1 year, scaling to over $6m in revenue/year without VC funding, and served over 5000+ clients across 172 countries.

Many of our employees joined and continually grow with TINT due to our radically transparent and fair culture. We believe that everyone at TINT deserves the opportunity to reach their potential, and TINT is a perfect vehicle to do so. Our cultural values and learnings prove so.

Opportunity:
Having achieved what we have with bootstrapped constraints and inbound tactics, we are seeking an experienced sales development representative to join our EU team.

Our perfect colleague is entrepreneurial, organized, high-energy and has strong interpersonal communication skills. You have a passion for sales and the ability to create meaningful relationships with senior decision makers. You have 2 years experience working in SaaS Enterprise Sales. Bonus points for previous work experience in marketing technology. We are looking for someone who knows how to manage their time and has top class communication skills. It’s critical that you are able to learn quickly when using new tools.

This is an ideal position for an entrepreneurial sales development agent with experience in software/marketing looking to advance quickly within a global SaaS team.


Responsibilities:

- Generating qualified demos and outbound opportunities by phone and email
- Build and execute strategy to penetrate FTSE 350+ accounts
- Working with our account executives to prospect intros and close large enterprise deals
- Reporting on our prospecting performance and identifying potential optimizations
- Updating and leveraging CRM to better track our business

Qualifications:

- Experience and familiarity with sales automation software
- Background in full lifecycle of enterprise technology sales
- Bachelor’s degree (B.A.) or at least 2 years of relevant work experience.
- Excellent written and verbal communication skills (English as first language).
- Proven ability to work in a fast-paced, dynamic and goal-oriented environment.
- Maintain a high sense of urgency and entrepreneurial work ethic that is required to drive business outcomes, with exceptional attention to detail.
- Experience with Salesforce preferred.
- Positive “can do” attitude, passionate and able to show commitment and to inspire others.
- Ability to set and manage multiple priorities.


Benefits:

- The Base Salary range is $25-33k GDP -- $34-46k USD - depending on experience. The compensation table for On Target Earnings (OTE) is currently being finalized and is estimated to be around $48-55k GDP -- $65-75k USD. Please note that this is an estimate and OTE is not final.
- It is expected that top performers will progress into full Account Executives role.
- Personal Development Stipend - A monthly stipend designed for self-improvement. Whether it's books, yoga classes, or a fitness tracker, we want our teammates to improve themselves.
- Team Transparency - We calculate compensation based on a formula that we all agree on. Cap table is made available to all employees. Business financials are known by all teammates.
- You will play a critical role in determining the company's success. We want someone who brings a strong opinion to the table and challenges us to perform to the highest standards.
- Equity
- Flexible vacation policy with recommended 1 week off per quarter.
- Flexible remote work policy
- Monthly philanthropy opportunities
- Annual company retreats
- Your own MacBook laptop

items.title: Sales Manager
items.content:
*WHO ARE WE?*
We are NETZ, a FinTech business currently disrupting the market with our high-tech prospecting and client intelligence engine.

We work with leading wealth managers, VCs, and crowd-funding platforms, supporting their investor engagement. Through our data-led AI technology, we help our clients source and engage with high-quality prospects such as for example HNWs, angel investors, or exited entrepreneurs. Within twelve months of launching, we have become profitable and are now looking to grow our team. We are based in London, but the candidate can work remotely.

*WHAT’S THE JOB DESCRIPTION?*
We’re looking for a results-driven sales manager for 1-2 days/week to actively seek out and engage customer prospects. You will provide complete and appropriate solutions for every customer in order to boost top-line revenue growth, customer acquisition levels and profitability.

Let's break the role down for you:
* Present, promote and sell our services using solid arguments to existing and prospective customers
* Perform cost-benefit and needs analysis of existing/potential customers to meet their needs
* Establish, develop and maintain positive business and customer relationships
* Reach out to customer leads through cold calling
* Expedite the resolution of customer problems and complaints to maximize satisfaction
* Achieve agreed upon sales targets and outcomes within schedule
* Coordinate sales effort with team members
* Supply management with reports on customer needs, problems, interests, competitive activities, and potential for new products and services.
* Keep abreast of best practices and promotional trends
* Continuously improve through feedback

*ABOUT YOU?*
* Proven work experience in sales and business development
* Excellent knowledge of MS Office
* Familiarity with CRM practices along with ability to build productive business professional relationships
* Highly motivated and target driven with a proven track record in sales
* Excellent selling, communication and negotiation skills
* Prioritizing, time management and organizational skills
* Ability to create and deliver presentations tailored to the audience needs
* Relationship management skills and openness to feedback
* BS/BA degree or equivalent

*WHAT ARE WE OFFERING?*
* Part-time role in London, remote is possible
* 20% commission + equity in the company
* Steep learning curve for building your career in FinTech and business development
* You will be working with an experienced team with passion, energy, drive
* You will get responsibility very early on

If you are interested in joining our fast-growing company, apply right now. Please send your CV and 3-4 lines on why you are the right candidate

items.content:
Enrollment Coach/ Sales Position

Posted Jan 9

Sylvie McCracken- Ebook Engines
Headquarters: Oregon
https://sylviemccracken.com

My team and I are looking to add 2 sales professionals to work as part our enrollment team for our group coaching program where we help doctors and other health professionals create 6 figure passive income streams with ebooks.

We've built an "evergreen" funnel that consistently produces 4-5 pre-qualified, pre-scheduled calls per day per rep.

Would you like to:

  • Earn $700 or MORE per enrollment? Be handed at least FIVE red-hot, pre-sold inbound leads EVERY DAY to talk to, with ZERO cold calling?
  • Be on the phone with prospects that have already SAID YES 10 times BEFORE they even get on the phone with you? 
  • Would you like to make an incredible DIFFERENCE in the lives of clients?

We provide our sales enrollment team:

  • AMAZING pre-sold leads Surgeon income from home
  • A Fun and Flexible working environment A World Class Program to sell
  • Sales training with a legendary sales trainer The ability to change lives

This position is for ambitious, hardworking salespeople that want to make lucrative commissions while making a massive difference in the world.

You like speaking on the phone and via zoom

If you meet ALL of the above criteria, let’s talk!

Apply for this position

If you’re interested, please complete the following 2- step process to begin (please do NOT PM me):1- Complete this application: http://sylviemccracken.pages.ontraport.net/Enrollment-Coach2- Take this quick assessment- tonyrobbins.com/disc - email us the results to support@sylviemccracken.com 3- Create a quick (under 3 min) video on WHY you are the perfect person for this role, and send to us at support@sylviemccracken.com(you can upload to YouTube or similar as unlisted and send me the link)We'll contact you if you’ve been selected to move to the next step.Feel free to tag or share with someone you think would be a great fit!Thank you!Sylvie McCrackenFounder & CEO of Ebook Engines

items.title: Senior Business Developer (Status Open Bounty)
items.content:
Status

Status is building powerful decentralized apps on Ethereum that change the way we do things on the web. Our rapidly growing team is made up of self-motivated individuals who prosper in a fast-paced environment and value the ability to work from anywhere.

Opportunity

Open Bounty is one of Status’ flagship products that aims to foster the movement for open source software.

Open source software is a multi-billion dollar industry, but historically has lacked the right incentive structures to reward developers for their efforts. Using blockchain technology and the power of smart contracts on Ethereum, Status Open Bounty enables developers to be rewarded in cryptocurrency for code contributions, and organisations to post bounties and find talented new team members.

Job role

We are looking for a Senior Business Developer to structure, develop and support our partnership activities for Status Open Bounty.

Your main duties include identifying and developing strategies to deliver more value to this product, identify partnership opportunities and lead all aspects of execution.

Responsibilities

  • Proactively push thinking around product partnerships and other strategic initiatives
  • Closes new business deals by coordinating requirements, developing and negotiating contracts
  • Responsible for achieving strategic account targets
  • Communicate with major partners on a regular basis and respond to specific queries
  • Assist in financial planning and analysis.
  • Integrating contract requirements with business operations.
  • Conduct research to identify new markets and customer needs

Requirements

  • 5+ years minimum work experience with sales or business development
  • Successful track record selling new business and products in emerging technology markets  
  • Ability to execute many tasks in parallel across multiple threads involving numerous stakeholders and counterparties
  • Technical savvy enabling you to easily interact with software developers and architects.
  • Ability to qualify leads and counterparties rigorously
  • Commitment to structured negotiations and outcomes
  • Excellent written and verbal English and communication skills
  • Ability to travel 25-50+% required depending on your location.
  • Self-motivated and the ability to work with a high degree of autonomy.

Working at Status

We're a remote team of made up of 40 people scattered around the globe. Everyone at Status works from a location of their choosing - and we all meet up twice a year to strategize and strengthen our relationships.

We care deeply about open source software, and our organizational structure does away with strict hierarchy and fixed work hours. We believe in working with a high degree of autonomy while supporting the team's priorities.

Compensation
£45K–£55K
No Equity
Visa Sponsorship

Job Description

As an Onboarding Solutions Consultant you’ll be responsible for driving sales of Talmundo products within Enterprise prospects located in The UK exceeding sales objectives. You will manage all aspects of the sales process including lead management, qualification, evaluation, close and support the customer success department when needed. This role is a quota-carrying sales position that plays an integral role in the success of the overall sales team.

The benefits of joining our team:

• Location: London, working remotely. With frequent visits to our main offices in Antwerp office and/or The Hague, which are both centrally located near the central train stations.
• Flexibility: We value balance and time with your family (however you define it). You can combine working from home, at our offices and working from client offices. We don’t focus on the number of hours but believe in trust and results.
• Opportunity: You'll work for one the most exciting start-ups in the Benelux region, now employing 20 people and working with some of the biggest brands and companies like Bacardi, Deloitte, ArcelorMittal, BNP, etc.
• Team: Join a young, dynamic and fast growing international team.
• Offer: We offer a competitive package with both short and long term incentives.

Some of the things you’ll be doing include:
• Define and execute territory / account sales plans for assigned geographic territory and then meet and exceed sales goals (quotas) through prospecting, qualifying, managing and closing sales opportunities.
• Develop and manage sales pipeline, prospect and assess sales and move a large number of transactions simultaneously through the sales pipeline.
• Manage and track customer and transactional information in a CRM system.
• Coordinate resources throughout the sales cycle, including product support and sales engineering.
• Provide product demonstrations and general support to prospective customers.
• Provide regular reporting of pipeline and forecast through the CRM system.
• Keep abreast of competition, competitive issues and products.
• Practice effective, excellent communication with management, prospects and support staff.
• Participate in team building and company-growth activities including strategy setting, sales training, marketing efforts and customer care.
• Travel to customer locations.
• Other duties as assigned.

Who you are:
• Experienced. 2 – 5 years of enterprise software sales experience.
• Multilingual. English native. Other languages will be a plus.
• Domain. Affinity with HR software solutions is preferred although not a must.
• Performer. Consistent overachievement of sales goals in a defined geographic territory.
• Eager to learn. You have a desire, even an obsession, to keep learning and develop new skills.
• Proactive. You don’t wait for things to happen, you make then happen.
• Consultant. Ability to quickly build trust with prospects using consultative selling approach.
• Challenger. Able to question current scenarios with facts and figures.
• Team player. Able to work independently but perfectly integrated into a team.
• Excellent Communication. You know what to say and more importantly, how to say it.
• Go-Getter. Willing to go the extra mile with a strong work ethic; self-directed and resourceful.

Does this sound like a role for you? Send us your CV to jobs@talmundo.com.

Yoko Co

Yoko Co is looking for an Senior Account Strategist - Someone to collaborate closely with clients and team members in the development and execution of a web presence strategy (mostly website design and development projects) that delivers tangible results.

In this role, you will work closely with clients who actually make a difference in the world, and it's our goal for you to have work that you thoroughly enjoy (most of the time), that challenges you to grow (much of the time), and which ultimately makes you proud (all of the time).

This position isn't for everyone. In fact, it's not for most people. It requires a combination of experience, knowledge, interpersonal skills, and creative problem solving that is found in less than 2.8% of the population.

If you think you've got what it takes, read on.

As an ideal candidate, you should:

  • Be comfortable working directly with clients, managing expectations, and explaining complex issues at whatever level of technical understanding they may have and championing their mission and passion for our team.
  • Be able to manage and maintain client relationships, coordinating with the team to ensure efforts are aligned with their objectives, and that calls and meetings are an upbeat and positive experience.
  • Understand the principles of marketing that gets results. This includes understanding the buyers journey, conversion orientation, calls to action, landing pages, autoresponders, drip email campaigns, squeeze pages, redemption pages and more.
  • Understand content marketing, search engine optimization, conversion rate optimization, marketing automation, and the slew of related and affiliated elements that affect these practices. (Experience with platforms like WordPress, Hubspot, Mailchimp, Google Analytics, etc. is great.)
  • Be well versed in traditional marketing communications skills including but not limited to copywriting, blogging, public relations, basic graphic design, web design best practices,
  • Understand the role these elements – and the website as a whole – relate to each client's organizational objectives and goals.
  • Follow a well-documented process and contribute to our agency's growth by updating it to make it more effective.
  • Be able to manage an internal team, collaborating and dictating strategy and aiding with tactical execution.
  • Be able to wear many hats, and change them quickly. In a single day, you may lead a client call to create strategy, sketch out a landing page, draft emails to clients, collaborate on a home page design, provide feedback on a client video or animation, collaborate with your team to draft new content and CTA ideas for approval, present a proposal, and then grab lunch.
  • Ideally have experience working in a similar position in an ad agency or web design firm. Alternatively have experience serving in a similar capacity virtually or on your own as an entrepreneur or contractor.
  • Be self-motivated and take initiative. If you're the kind of person who waits for someone to tell you what to do, this isn't your kind of place.
  • Be a problem solver, both collaboratively and on your own. Your Google-fu must be strong.
  • Be well-spoken and be able to take command of a room, call, or conversation.
  • Have a map to the fabled, but likely cursed, Montezuma’s Treasure.
  • Have a "can-do attitude" and be willing to jump in and try something new to expand your skills and contribute to our greater good.
  • Be willing to give and receive feedback responsibly, have the perspective to evaluate it, and the flexibility to make adjustments.
  • Be an avid learner. Half the fun of this job is learning what goes on behind the scenes in new client industries and keeping up with a constantly shifting market and our own quick paced rapidly evolving industry. You should be excited to share knowledge by educating and receiving education from others both team members and clients.
  • Be passionate about your work. As an agency we know the impact we have on the world is through the way we amplify our clients' impact. For that reason we work only with people with whom we're well aligned. That goes for clients and employees.

In this role, you'll be encouraged to contribute to and shape a company as it grows in a way you'd never have the opportunity to within a larger firm.

Still intrigued?

Good! In exchange for these skills you'll be rewarded with a very flexible work schedule, medical benefits, the option to telecommute as you'd like, great pay, unlimited leave, as well as participation in our annual shutdown (two, sometimes more, weeks off at the end of the year) and most federal holidays. Perhaps more importantly you'll find yourself immersed in work that actually matters.

P.S. - It's worth mentioning that if you join us, you'll participate in our pursuit to positively impact the lives of 100,000,000 people by the end of 2020. It's no small task, but we're already at over 27,000,000 and with someone like you on the team? Our odds just got better.

items.title: Senior Business Development (Status Open Bounty)
items.content:
Status

Status is building powerful decentralized apps on Ethereum that change the way we do things on the web. Our rapidly growing team is made up of self-motivated individuals who prosper in a fast-paced environment and value the ability to work from anywhere.

Opportunity

Open Bounty is one of Status’ flagship products that aims to foster the movement for open source software.

Open source software is a multi-billion dollar industry, but historically has lacked the right incentive structures to reward developers for their efforts. Using blockchain technology and the power of smart contracts on Ethereum, Status Open Bounty enables developers to be rewarded in cryptocurrency for code contributions, and organisations to post bounties and find talented new team members.

Job role

We are looking for a Senior Business Developer to structure, develop and support our partnership activities for Status Open Bounty.

Your main duties include identifying and developing strategies to deliver more value to this product, identify partnership opportunities and lead all aspects of execution.

Responsibilities

  • Proactively push thinking around product partnerships and other strategic initiatives
  • Closes new business deals by coordinating requirements, developing and negotiating contracts
  • Responsible for achieving strategic account targets
  • Communicate with major partners on a regular basis and respond to specific queries
  • Assist in financial planning and analysis.
  • Integrating contract requirements with business operations.
  • Conduct research to identify new markets and customer needs

    Requirements

  • 5+ years minimum work experience with sales or business development
  • Successful track record selling new business and products in emerging technology markets  
  • Ability to execute many tasks in parallel across multiple threads involving numerous stakeholders and counterparties
  • Technical savvy enabling you to easily interact with software developers and architects.
  • Ability to qualify leads and counterparties rigorously
  • Commitment to structured negotiations and outcomes
  • Excellent written and verbal English and communication skills
  • Ability to travel 25-50+% required depending on your location.
  • Self-motivated and the ability to work with a high degree of autonomy.

    Working at Status

    We're a remote team of made up of 40 people scattered around the globe. Everyone at Status works from a location of their choosing - and we all meet up twice a year to strategize and strengthen our relationships.

    We care deeply about open source software, and our organizational structure does away with strict hierarchy and fixed work hours. We believe in working with a high degree of autonomy while supporting the team's priorities.

-----------------

We’re looking for high energy, technologically sound individuals. If you’ve often referred to yourself as a sales hacker, or believe you have the drive to be one, you should seriously think about applying.

You need to have some experience with Cloud/SaaS and enterprise software technologies and be comfortable with conducting product demos.

Experience with closing sales over the phone and through email is a must.

Wiretap is a rapidly growing tech startup located in Columbus, OH, specializing in enterprise cloud security. Since our launch in 2015, our platform has received world-wide attention and is trusted by some of the largest enterprises in the Fortune 100. Demand for securing enterprise social networking data is growing and so is our customer pipeline.

Does working in a bleeding-edge industry on a killer security platform excite you? Now is your chance to work with our high energy, talented team in our fast-growing startup. If you’re a fit, benefits like unlimited vacation, free snacks/drinks and a cool office await you!

items.title: PR Account Executive
items.content:
About Prezzroom:

Prezzroom, a public relations company for startups with clients in London and New York, is seeking a public relations Account Executive -- a mid-level to senior-level role -- for immediate hire.

Prezzroom is made for startups, by startups. We're on a mission to challenge the PR industry and bring quality, yet affordable PR services to small businesses. Focusing on Health and Wellness, one of the world's fastest-growing markets, we discover today’s newest and most innovative companies and make sure they get the exposure their brand deserves.

Our global roster of clients includes several of the fastest growing brands in wellness, covering fitness events and studios, food and drink, as well as new consumer technology across health, beauty and fashion. We are seeking an ambitious, entrepreneurial, professional, and enthusiastic self-starter interested in rapidly advancing their career in public relations while helping some of the newest, most extraordinary companies take off. All candidates must have at least two years post-university experience either at a public relations agency or in-house.

Duties:

Executing PR campaigns as an integral member of a team
Drafting, editing, and reviewing press materials
Dealing with enquiries from press, clients, new business and external organizations
Issuing press releases and pitching to reporters both within the UK and internationally
Daily media monitoring
On a regular basis, conducting direct client engagement
Undertaking industry research and generating story ideas and angles
Developing and maintain relationships with media to secure and grow coverage
Supporting in-person and phone meetings with clients and potential new business
Supporting and training your own personal Intern

Skills Requirement:

Minimum of 2 years PR agency experience post-university
Exceptional written and verbal communication
Excellent knowledge of the health and wellness or food and drink industry
Demonstrated ability to think strategically and to identify opportunities for clients
Ability to communicate clearly and transfer complex information in a concise and clear form
Ability to prioritize and plan effectively
Strong attention to detail
Ability to work well in a startup team
Excellent interpersonal skills
Motivated to excel in a fast-paced environment
Ability to maintain a high level of social, organizational and professional standards in job-related activities

Candidates must submit a resume and cover letter.

Job Type: Full-time

Job Location:
London, UK
Flexible hours
Ability to work remotely

Required education:
Bachelor's

Required experience:
post-university: 2 years

Required language:
English

  • Develops clear and effective written proposals and quotations for current and prospective customers
  • Establishes ongoing relationships with distributor sales representatives within the territory
  • Drives the resolution of customer problems and complaints
  • Analyzes the territory’s potential and determines the value of existing and prospective customer’s value to the company
  • Creates and manages a customer value plan for existing customers highlighting profile, share and value opportunities
  • Supplies management with oral and written reports on customer needs, problems, interests, competitive activities, and potential for new products and services

Candidate Requirements:

  • Bachelor’s Degree in Business, Marketing, or related field
  • 2 plus years in territory development and account management in the packaging industry
  • Ability to work from a home office environment with minimal supervision
  • Outstanding prospecting and closing skills is a must
  • Technical and conceptual understanding of flexible films and film applications
  • Working knowledge of film extrusion, bag making, converting, process printing
  • Ability to travel 50% when needed
  • Ability to attend quarterly sales meetings
  • Excellent oral and written communication skills
  • Computer expertise in Microsoft Office, Experience with Salesforce.com CRM and LinkedIn
  • High level of drive and ambition for professional growth
  • Willing and able to learn and execute a specific sales process and ongoing training

About the Company

  • Novolex™ is North America’s leader in packaging choice and sustainability.
  • The leadership of Novolex’s packaging brands sprouts from innovation, a diversity of products and markets, and a dedication to sustainability and quality.
  • The family of historic Novolex™ brands includes Bagcraft® Packaging, Hilex Poly®, Fortune Plastics®, Duro Bag®, De Luxe® Packaging, Burrows Paper, Novolex Custom Film & Bag™, International Converter®, General Packaging® Products, and Heritage Bag®.
  • Each of the Novolex™ brands brings a unique sustainability and product story in plastic, paper, foil, recycling, or composting applications. The Novolex™ brands are unified by four common values: Manufacturing Innovation and Quality; Service; Packaging Choice; and Sustainability.
  • Novolex™ is headquartered in Hartsville, SC and has 46 manufacturing facilities around the globe, including the worlds’ largest closed loop plastic bag recycling plant located in Indiana. The company has over 7,000 employees in the US, Canada, Mexico and Europe.
  • Novolex™ focuses on customers within the retail, grocery, convenience store, deli, food service, hospitality, institutional, processor and industrial markets. The Novolex™ product portfolio and our engineered solutions are designed to meet customer packaging application needs in the areas of food contact, customer experience, resale items, checkout systems, can liners and packaging operations.
  • The company rebranded under the name Novolex™ in November 2014. The change signifies a number of great companies coming together under a new name focused on delivering value to our customers, suppliers and employees through broader product categories and markets. Novolex’s family of packaging brands creates value and synergies by covering the full spectrum of retailer and institutional companies packaging requirements.
  • The Novolex™ name is based on the Latin “NOVO” for new and “LEX” a tip of the hat to Hilex Poly, the first brand to become part of the family. The blue and red of our logo represents the integration of both paper and plastic into our sustainability platform with red and blue being the legacy corporate colors of Hilex Poly® and Duro Bag® respectively.

Our Mission

  • Novolex’s™ mission is to continue a tradition of leadership established by our historic brands in the areas of packaging choice, customer service, manufacturing innovation, quality, and sustainability.

Our Vision Statement

  • To be a leading provider of packaging solutions that are environmentally friendly, create value for the customer and Novolex™, have excellent quality, and provide superior service.
  • We want to accomplish this with an entrepreneurial culture which drives operational excellence and proactively creates ecological solutions.

Our Environmental Mission
Novolex's sustainability goal is to establish a viable environmental program and product line that:

  • Reduces the impact of plastic and paper on the environment through recycling and increased recycled content
  • Sets a high standard of industry leadership and corporate citizenship
  • Creates meaningful benefits for the environment and the community
  • Facilitates environmental action by retailers and the community

For more information on Novolex™, visit our website at: www.novolex.com

The Company has reviewed this job description to ensure that essential functions and basic duties have been included. It is not intended to be construed as an exhaustive list of all functions and responsibilities. Additional functions and requirements may be assigned by supervisors as deemed appropriate. Pre-employment, as well as post-hire substance testing, is required for specified positions through Novolex. Must be legally authorized to work in the United States without Company sponsorship.

Novolex™ is committed to providing equal employment opportunity in all employment practices, including but not limited to, selection, hiring, promotion, transfer, and compensation to all qualified applicants and employees without regard to age, race, color, national origin, sex, pregnancy, sexual orientation, gender identity, religion, handicap or disability, genetics, citizenship status, service member or veteran status, or any other category protected by federal, state, or local law. Any individual, who because of his or her disability, needs an accommodation in connection with an aspect of the Company’s application process should contact Jamie Wells at 800-845-6051.

Novolex is an E-Verify Employer

Deltek, Inc. -Remote
Deltek is seeking an Account Executive to work on our dynamic mid-market team. As an Account Executive at Deltek, you will be responsible for all net new sales related activities within a defined US territory. Your focus will center on selling the Deltek suite of Enterprise Resource Planning (ERP) applications to the new business Marcom (Marketing & Communications) vertical. Your duties will include prospecting, pipeline building, opportunity development/management, presentation/demonstration, negotiation and closure of sales campaigns and opportunities with contacts at all levels including C level and VP level. Experience working with and leading clients through a strategic & defined sales processes

Proven track record of over achievement against assigned quota. Excel at closing new business against brand name competitors, overcoming resistance to change and developing advisor based relationships.

Excellent prospecting, communication, negotiation and closing skills.

Ability to lead a collaborative sales effort engaging supporting personnel from other teams.
Experience and skilled usage with CRM, Power Point, Word, Excel and Outlook.
